resources.string: Single-point Bluetooth devices are devices that have a one-to-one connection with a cell phone terminal via Bluetooth, such as Bluetooth bracelets, Bluetooth headsets, Bluetooth speakers, etc. Each device can be connected to a cell phone at the same time, and the number of simultaneous Bluetooth connections per cell phone terminal is currently limited to 6 to 7.\n\nTap Search to pair BLE device.
Let the Zigbee Gateway connect to the router, and make sure iPhone and the gateway are in the same local area network, then tap search.

AP Mode, also known as hotspot mode. The mobile phone connects the smart device’s hotspot, and the two parties establish a Socket connection to exchange data through the agreed port.Let the device in pairing mode, \nthen switch iPhone’s Wi-Fi to the device’s hotspot. Type in the SSID and password of which Wi-Fi you want the device connect to, then tap Search.
